Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2007 01:55PM helly_63 wrote: hi ctg, after reading your post your the first women who really could maybe explain a few things about rad to the brain for me....i had a 2.5cm tumor which was removed with surgery as it was easily accessible just behind my forehead i have 1 other lesion 5mm at the back(im not very techno on all this and still havnt received my biopsy report, but was recommended wbr for 10 treatments,the options and treatments that you mentioned would they have been valid in my case?..im also going to enquire about the tykerb but dont know as yet whether it is available here in australia....any input you could share would be most appreciated thanx,helen
Posts.Title: stage IV breast cancer michele0369 helly_63

Posts.Content: Oct 20, 2007 05:12PM helly_63 wrote: thanx,youve been so helpful,im a little angry that i never really had options it was all rather rushed but iv just fin reading my mri report and the small lesion i have is in the right parietal region and 1.2cm in depth in relation to the cortical surface....heck i dont know what it all means they only said wbr is best as any unforseen cells would be destroyed. well im up to my 5th treatment with 5 to go so i guess i will have to get that second opinion afterwards...thanx so much for your helpxo
Posts.Title: stage IV breast cancer michele0369 helly_63

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2007 01:48PM helly_63 wrote: hi michelle,sor to hear your diagnoses i too have been diagnosed with brain mets...i had surgery to remove 1 which was lucky for me as it was 2.5cm big and just behind my forehead so easy to get to..but i have another lesion which is not operable so im having 10 treatments of WBR and iv currently had 4...have your drs discussed your treatment as yet/...although its pretty scary when it spreads to your brain one mustnt give up as there are many treatments available and it is certainly a matter of will as well,just rem you are not alone in this i hope you have a lot of fam support as i know im lucky to.....if you have any questions please get back to mme,and good luck,sending wishes your way michelle,helen
